scenes.visual_prompt: An extreme close-up of a sleek, polished rose gold luxury watch with a dark sapphire leather strap, resting on a soft, dark velvet cushion. Cinematic three-point lighting, with a soft key light highlighting the watch's intricate details and a subtle golden hour backlight catching the polished edges. Perfectly centered in the frame, within the safe zone.
scenes.audio_prompt: Subtle, distant ticking sound, elegant ambient music fades in.
scenes.motion_prompt: Locked-off static, with a very subtle and slow macro focus pull from the watch hands to the logo.

scenes.visual_prompt: The same rose gold luxury watch, elegantly worn on the wrist of an unseen, impeccably dressed individual. The watch face is prominently displayed, reflecting soft, diffused natural light from a large window. Background is subtly blurred, suggesting a sophisticated high-end environment. The watch remains centered in the safe zone.
scenes.audio_prompt: Gentle ambient room tone, soft jazz music continues.
scenes.motion_prompt: Slow dolly push-in, followed by a subtle, elegant turn of the wrist to catch the light.
